name: sidebysidetranslator
description: Chromium/Firefox extension for translating images in a page with the option to view side by side.

scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p lib && cp node_modules/tesseract.js/dist/tesseract.min.js lib/ && cp node_modules/tesseract.js/dist/worker.min.js lib/ && cp node_modules/tesseract.js-core/tesseract-core.wasm.js lib/
